results.title: Inhibition of smooth muscle cell calcium mobilization and aortic ring contraction by lactone vastatins.
results.text_hl: Treatment of aortic rings with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited the @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@-induced contraction 58 +/- 0.06%.

citations.NLM: Escobales N, Crespo MJ, Altieri PI, Furilla RA. Inhibition of smooth muscle cell calcium mobilization and aortic ring contraction by lactone vastatins. J Hypertens. 1996 Jan;14(1):115-21. PMID: 12013483
